title: Moving AI governance forward
summary: OpenAI and other leading AI labs are making voluntary commitments to enhance the safety, security, and trustworthiness of AI technology. These commitments include red-teaming of models, information sharing on trust and safety risks, cybersecurity measures, incentivizing the discovery of vulnerabilities, enabling users to identify AI-generated content, reporting on model capabilities and limitations, prioritizing research on societal risks, and developing AI systems to address societal challenges. These commitments aim to advance AI governance and promote responsible AI development and use.
